about_the_game:
Dragon Hop is a challenging 3D precision platformer game with RPG elements and a high emphasis on exploration and treasure hunting. You play as a dragon hatchling who haven't learned how to use their little wings yet. But do not fret, as there may be other dragons in this world who can guide you, so you can grow to be as powerful as them!

Are you ready to prove yourself? Well, start climbing!

Falling




Dragon Hop is all about getting as high as you can get, to see all this world has to offer. Naturally, slipping, falling, and trying again plays a big part in that. Your journey will be hard, but there are ways for the keen-eyed and curious to make it easier.

Treasures




If you like exploring, in Dragon Hop you shall be greatly rewarded, as there are plenty of treasures scattered around the world, waiting for you to find them! Found a hidden door? There's likely a golden chest waiting on the other side. See a cave entrance? Time for spelunking! Who knows what kind of crystals may lie beneath the earth?

Upgrades




Are your pockets full of treasures? Well, it's time to use them! Speak with your dragon guide to exchange crystals and learn new skills for your dragon. Gliding? No problem! Spitting fireballs? Bring on the heat! Flying? If you just believe, there shall be nothing stopping you from touching the sky!

Enemies




While you may find those who guide your journey in Dragon Hop, there are also some creatures who would like to slow your hasty ascent. They are not here to completely ruin the fun... just to be a bit annoying. Nevertheless, you could find a great deal of satisfaction in sniping them off of platforms with a well aimed fireball! And who knows? Maybe it's treasure they were guarding after all.

Interactions




Having a hard time hopping? See if you can use your environment to your advantage. From riding animals, to activating forgotten constructs - sailing boats to opening portals, so much is possible in the world of Dragon Hop. Never be afraid to explore and experiment.

Happy Hopping!

name: Dragon Hop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor / AMD Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor / Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Put your jumping skills to the test in this beautiful 3D platformer, playing as a dragon! Explore unique areas to find hidden treasures, collect crystals and trade them for skills to help you on your journey. Can you get to the top?
